paper_abstract: It is well known that one of the features of long-memory processes is that they tend to have what looks like trends and cycles. A consequence of this property is that it is difficult to distinguish a long-memory process from a nonstationary process. In this paper, we study the impact of the periodicity and trend on different methods for estimating the long-memory processes parameter d.
paper_title: Impact of the periodicity and trend on the FD parameter estimation
